backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (News, Review, UserProfile, LiveStatus) and CRUD operations for a news platform, with role-based access control for admin/user actions, article expiry, and review management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that descending date-order sorting is implemented across all article listing pages and sidebar components in the frontend.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose, recent changes, and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including background, foreground, accent, chart, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AP Insight News app, loading the React app via main.tsx and including a Google AdSense script tag.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with a root layout (Header/Footer + ActorLoadingGuard) and routes for home, political, movies, article detail, admin, and admin reviews pages.
frontend/src/components/ActorLoadingGuar: Guard component that blocks child rendering until the backend actor is ready, showing a spinner while loading and an error/retry UI if connection times out or fails.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Reusable Google AdSense banner component supporting horizontal and rectangle formats, with safe initialization guarded against ad blockers.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Article card component with four display variants (featured, newspaper, default, compact) that renders article image, category badge, title, summary, author, and date using imageData from the backend News type.
Renders a single news article as a compact list item with thumbnail, category badge, title, summary, author, and date, linking to the article detail page.
frontend/src/components/BreakingNewsTick: Displays a horizontally scrolling breaking news ticker showing the 10 most recent articles sorted by creation date, with links to each article.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick navigation links, category links, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky site header containing the breaking news ticker, logo, current date, navigation links, mobile menu toggle, and admin-only controls for live status toggling.
frontend/src/components/TopStoriesSideba: Sidebar component that displays the top 5 most recent articles sorted by date with numbered rankings, plus an ad banner below the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and exposing login status states to the React component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including fetching, adding, and deleting news articles and reviews, as well as purging expired articles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes and news-specific design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing news articles, allowing authenticated users to add articles with image uploads, delete articles, and purge expired content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewsPage.tsx: Admin page for viewing and deleting all user-submitted reviews, displaying reviewer info, star ratings, and associated article IDs.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Full article detail page that displays article content, related articles, and a reviews section where authenticated users can submit star ratings and written reviews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that displays a hero article, secondary stories, and category sections (political, movie news) with skeleton loading states, all sorted by date descending.
frontend/src/pages/MovieNewsPage.tsx: Paginated movie news listing page with a sidebar, skeleton loaders, and a 'Load More' button, displaying articles sorted by date descending.
frontend/src/pages/PoliticalNewsPage.tsx: Paginated political news listing page with a sidebar, skeleton loaders, and a 'Load More' button, displaying articles sorted by date descending.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (oklch-based), fonts (Roboto, Telugu), border radii, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing features, pending feature requests, and metadata for the AP Insight News platform, focused on sorting articles by descending date.
